name: Lambda (Interfiber)
description:
Lambda is a in-alpha topdown 2d tile-based adventure game based on minecraft.

Keybinds:

WASD  - Move

C - Open crafting menu

X - Interact with tile in front of player

Arrows - Move menu cursor

Enter - Select item in menu

ESC - Open pause menu
